name: CyberBox
description:
Puzzle game for GMTKJam2021

CyberCube is a sci-fi puzzle game in which you have to move your character from the starting point to the yellow point. But the cubes get in the way. They move all the time while your character is moving.

The game has 6 levels

7 types of cubes

2 types of additional items (boosters, stoppers)

and 1 sci-fi character

Controls:

WASD - Movement

R - restart
